Question: On April 26, 1989, this person died of a dissecting aortic aneurysm at age 77.
Hints: The following year, this person did a musical on Broadway, Wildcat, co-starring Paula Stewart.
This person met and eloped with Cuban bandleader Desi Arnaz in 1940.
In 1951, this person was instrumental in the creation of the television series I Love Lucy.
